line_1: But Helen chang'd her first Condition,
Is in a very sad Condition.
And should We both in this Condition,
line_2: Have conquer'd Love, and worse Ambition;

line_1: My muse, in tatter'd low condition,
line_2: O JANET, by your kind permission,

line_1: To all the people of condition.
line_2: And doff their hats with due submission:

line_1: And To-Day many Persons of Rank and Condition
line_2: Were boil'd by Command of an able Physician,

line_1: Was in Hopes very soon to have chang'd her Condition;
line_2: Miss JENNY, poor Thing, from this Bath Expedition,

line_1: I ne'er had been in this condition
